answers.answer: Hi,yes diabetes can affect the immune system.Your grandfather has a lot going on.  At his age, even minor illness can be serious.Wishing you well.

question: My grandfather is 94, he's got type 2 diabetes, dementia and alhzeimer's, probably some high blood pressure too. Does the type 2 diabetes affect your immune system?
title: Does type 2 diabetes affect your immune system?
